entry.title: What we should've said.
entry.summary:
Author: redwingz

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,140Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 2

Summary: "I can't keep doing this with you.""Doing what?""Pretending like we don't mean something to each other."Richard Grayson is a natural born-leader. The golden one.Jason Todd is always getting into trouble. He gets the job done, not without costs.In a Gotham where all the heroes are also trying to get by; pulling in money, respect and status where they can, can Dick convince Jason that his life is worth something more than him being a weapon?Richard doesn't like killing. Jason does what needs to be done.An alternative version of Gotham more themed around the Batfamily being a secret ‚Äòcrime‚Äô family. They run jobs to earn their wealth, whether its drug busts or transports, stealing, etc. They make an appearance to be heroes that save people, which is genuine- but to fund their ventures and control crime the way it needs to be, they do the dark alley stuff at night.

Summary: There's a tension between Nightwing and Red Hood. Everyone sees it, even the rogues. The citizens of Gotham decide to try to get the two together as thanks for all the work they do for the city. The rogues like the excuse to cause more chaos. The vigilantes just want to be left alone to do their jobs.~~~Dick doesn't know who the Red Hood is. Doesn't stop him from pinning for the man. And apparently the entirety of Gotham has taken notice. entry.title: Dick Grayson: Batman Beyond Eternal
entry.summary:
Author: locksandkeys

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,115Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Dick‚Äôs POV:It‚Äôs been 300 years since I fought criminals every night and still do‚Äîand longer still since I was human. I‚Äôve outlived Bruce, Jason, and most of the people I ever loved. I was Nightwing for a long time, now I carry the mantle of Batman, lead a family of vigilantes, and I walk under the sun as something no vampire was ever meant to be: a hybrid, forged from blood and Kryptonian power. In fact, no vampire has successfully recreated my condition.I thought I‚Äôd seen it all‚Äîuntil he showed up.Catlad. A thief with Jason‚Äôs face and none of his history. He shouldn‚Äôt exist. But looking at him brought back things I buried centuries ago. And while I‚Äôm chasing a ghost, the real threat is growing. The vampire cult Clark and I destroyed long ago is rising again, angry, desperate, and willing to bleed the world dry to recreate what I‚Äôve become. There‚Äôs a storm coming. I‚Äôve trained my nephews to survive it. But to win, I‚Äôll have to confront the past I swore I buried and the monster I sometimes wonder I‚Äôve become.

entry.title: The Hunt is On
entry.summary:
Author: Kishirokitsune

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,697Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: "What do you mean we're lost?" Jason demanded, whipping his head over to Dick, who was standing there staring at the map with a puzzled look on his face."I mean, not lost lost, just... The map isn't the most detailed and this place is like a labyrinth. Look, we're fine. I'm pretty sure I know where to go from here."Jason growled and stomped over to the older man, jerking the map from his hands and eliciting a startled "hey!" from Dick. "We're fucking lost in the mist and there's a gods-damned behemoth on the loose! What part of that is fine?!"---A pit stop at the chocobo farm leads to Dick and Jason heading off on their own to square off against a behemoth that's been harassing the chocobos. Surprisingly, things go mostly according to plan.For JayDick Week, Day 1: Royalty AU*no knowledge of Final Fantasy is needed to enjoy this fic
